sn37.24:1.1: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
sn37.24:1.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
sn37.24:1.4: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
